JOB DESCRIPTION: Senior Software Developer ASP/.Net/SQL Server Gurgaon      Job Summary : Senior Software ASP.NET/C# Developer      Job Requirements :    B.Sc/M.Sc degree in Computer Science or Engineering    3-5 years of experience in the following technologies :    a) SOs : Windows (at programming level)    b) ASP.NET, C#, Webforms, Jquery, Ajax, SignalR, XML, Javascript.    c) DB: MS SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL.    d) Development environments: MS Visual Studio, Eclipse    e) Virtual environments (VMWare), Tomcat, JDK, NetBeans, Net    d) Framework 3.5 and 4.6    e) Servers: IIS, FTP    f) Experience in revision control systems (GIT, subversion).    Desirable Capabilities :    The candidate should have good skills in writing technical documentation in English (user and installing manuals).    High capability to analyze, diagnose and solve problems.    High commitment to projects, working team and customers.    Methodic person, organized and with high initiative.    Languages : Proficient in English, Spanish desirable    Others : Availability of traveling around India from time to time.
